definition: to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]

sentences.english: Sometimes I felt so mortified I almost wanted to cry.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，我感到很是屈辱，幾欲痛哭。

sentences.english: I almost ran right inside, but was afraid to turn my back on the voice.
sentences.chinese: 我幾欲跑進屋，但又不敢背對那聲音發出的地方。

sentences.english: Several desire tear to pieces my eyes.
Then she heard the muttered words of prayer, in the midst of which she started, and would have arisen.
sentences.chinese: 這時，她聽到了喃喃的禱告聲，心中大駭，幾欲起身。
